entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:57 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 8:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High zero.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
